author: dfraser
title: Manchester United’s new home kit ‘leaked’ online as images of a new red jersey surface

organizations.name: manchester united kante keep him away

text:
Kit of alright? Manchester United’s new home kit ‘leaked’ online as images of a new red jersey surface 
Images of a tweaked adidas-Chevrolet jersey have popped up on the internet, with many suggesting it's the 2017-18 strip Pictured 15th March 2017, 2:33 pm Updated: 15th March 2017, 3:15 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments WE’RE now well into March with the Premier League season once again winding down to an exciting finale. 
But as is always the way at this time of year, a series of ‘fake’ jerseys have been appearing online in what is quickly becoming known as ‘kit leak season’. PA:Press Association 3 Will this leaked jersey be worn by Jose Mourinho’s men in 2017-18? 
While it’s easy to guess the fakes more often than not, one particular leaked Manchester United strip looks particularly convincing. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary. 
Perhaps it’s mainly due to the fact it’s not wildly different to this current jersey, this particular snap looks more genuine. 
Typically United red, the kit features black and white piping around the sleeves and adidas’ trademark three stripes on the shoulder. N'golo Kante scores a great goal for Chelsea against Manchester United in the FA Cup The leaked Manchester United jersey, showing off new adidas stripes PA:Press Association 3 The new jersey is not wildly different to the kit worn by Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Co this season 
Whether this top is genuine or not, one thing is for sure, United's next jersey will be made by adidas. 
After all, the sports clothing company are only heading into their third year of a £750million, decade long contract. 
The only question now is this: Will Zlatan Ibrahimovic be wearing the kit next year or will he be moving on once more?
